welcome.title: Elpis
welcome.description: With Elpis you can train speech recognition models and use these models to transcribe audio. Elpis can do word-level (orthographic) and phone-level (phonemic) recognition.
welcome.train_description: To train a model, you will need audio recordings and transcriptions of the speech.
welcome.transcribe_description: Once you have trained a model, you can get a transcription for un-transcribed speech.

common.kaldi_description: This will require audio files, transcriptions and a 'letter to sound' file.

files.title: Add files
files.description:
Upload your language recording and transcription files here. 
 Please use 16kHz WAV format audio, and .eaf Elan transcription files. 
 Audio files and transcription files need to have matching filenames. 
 You can also upload text files like wordlists or stories that don't have audio.
files.tierOrderDescription: Choose the tier that your transcriptions are on
files.puncDescription: Punctuation will be removed from the transcriptions. Add punctuation marks here that you want to be replaced by spaces when removed.

fileUpload.dropFilesHint: Upload or drop your files here

prepare.title: Wordlist
prepare.description: This is showing only the text from the transcription files, not words from additional text that was uploaded.
prepare.bannerMessage: Text has been cleaned and normalised OK
prepare.noWords: No words found, please upload some files or check your import settings.

common.noDatasetsLabel: Recordings are required before making pronunciation dictionary.

l2s.title: Upload Letter to Sound rules
l2s.description:
The letter to sound file is used to build a pronunciation dictionary for the corpus. Make one by listing one column of all the characters in your corpus. Make a second column (separated by a space) of a symbol representing how that characted is pronounced. You can use IPA, or SAMPA for the pronunciation symbols. You can include comments in this file by beginning the comment line with #. For example: 

 # This is a comment 
 n n 
 ng ŋ 
 r r 
 y j
l2s.dropFilesHint: Upload your l2s file, or drop one here

lexicon.title: Review the pronunciation dictionary
lexicon.description:
The pronunciation dictionary is generated from the wordlist and letter-to-sound rules you uploaded. 

 Characters surrounded by parenthesis were not found in your letter to sound map. Please add them, re-upload the l2s file and check the lexicon again.

new.title: New training session
new.selectPronDictLabel: Select a pronunciation dictionary for this session

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: These settings are used to adjust the training.
settings.ngramDescription: The n-gram adjusts whether the system learns single words or words and their neighbours. A value of 1 will set the system to learn single words. To make the system learn from words and their neighbouring words, set the n-gram to 2 or 3.

results.title: Results
results.description: Results are obtained by testing the model on a sample of audio from the recordings. The error rate is calculated by adding up all the words that are wrongly skipped, added, or swapped compared to what was spoken. The number of errors is then dividing by the total number of words that were spoken.

kaldi.count: Number of incorrect words / total words
kaldi.del: Deletions: spoken words missed in the transcription (DEL).
kaldi.ins: Insertions: extra words added to the text that weren't spoken (INS).
kaldi.sub: Substitutions: correct words swapped for incorrectly recognised words (SUB).

tiers.title: Tiers
tiers.description: Choose the tier that your transcriptions are on, just choose one of these.
tiers.name: Tier name

cleaning.title: Cleaning
cleaning.description: Remove text from annotations, add one per line.

new.title: Transcribe some audio
new.selectModelLabel: Select a training session to use
new.dropFilesHint: Upload or drop an audio file here

choose_model.title: Choose a model to use for transcribing
choose_model.upload_model: Upload a model (from a zip file)

results.title: Transcribed results
results.downloadButtonNotReadyYet: A download button will be available after the data has been transcribed and the file has been generated.
results.toggleOpacityLabel: Fade out words that are less certain.
